description: Verification Order required to confirm the description and numbering of the residential units within the building, with main entrance point fronting Roland Gardens, linked to Planning application PP/23/06752 as follows:Flat A, (Basement and Ground Floor), 26 Roland Gardens, LONDON, SW7 3PLFlat B, (First Floor and Second Floor), 26 Roland Gardens, LONDON, SW7 3PLFlat C, (Third Floor and Fourth Floor), 26 Roland Gardens, LONDON, SW7 3PLThe following addresses to be deleted:Basement Flat, 26 Roland Gardens, LONDON, SW7 3PLFirst Floor Flat, 26 Roland Gardens, LONDON, SW7 3PLGround Floor Flat, 26 Roland Gardens, LONDON, SW7 3PLSecond Floor Flat, 26 Roland Gardens, LONDON, SW7 3PLThird Floor Flat, 26 Roland Gardens, LONDON, SW7 3PL
